founder.title: Founder’s Profile
founder.name: I am Mr. Sulayman,
founder.graduation: the founder of Soloman Investigation and Business Consultant Ltd., with over 12 years of international experience and a solid professional background. I completed my secondary education in Hong Kong before pursuing accounting studies in the UK. I hold certifications in Private Detective Training from the UK, Senior Financial Advisor, and U.S. Certified Financial Consultant.
founder.experience: After graduation, I returned to Hong Kong, where I gained extensive practical experience through roles in financial consulting and international trade. Working on business cases across Greater China, the Middle East, Europe, and Africa, I demonstrated exceptional problem-solving abilities and insights. Driven by a passion for uncovering the truth, I transitioned into the investigative industry, progressing from a field investigator at a renowned agency to a senior investigative consultant at Hong Kong’s largest investigation firm, where I deepened my expertise in this field.
founder.relocating: After relocating to the UK, I founded Solomon Investigation and Business Consultant Ltd. as a platform to serve clients with my professional expertise and cross-cultural experience. As a passionate professional in the investigative field, I firmly believe that beneath every surface lies hidden truths waiting to be uncovered. My mission is to deliver tailored solutions through professionalism, integrity, and innovation—resolving challenges while achieving mutual success and continually pursuing excellence.
